txt.en: Legends of the Old Forest abound. It is a place of fear and malevolent spirit. Some dark will fills the trees with a hatred of all that goes on two legs. It is up to you to quell the Forest's malevolent spirit.
Defeat awakened trees in the Old Forest
Defeat additional awakened trees in the Old Forest.
Slay 60 Huorns within the Old Forest.
The Hobbits of Buckland once defended their borders against the trees of the Old Forest. Now they look to you to quell the Forest's malevolent spirit.
